nodes.text: Holrik was a Human male who lived on the planet of Taloraan during the Clone Wars. Like many of the local Denfrandi, he lived in a gondola attached to a local herbivore named sleft-chuff, that lived in the upper levels of gas giant's atmosphere. In 21 BBY Holrik was briefly disturbed when Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano landed in his gondola while running for her life. Holrik mistook her for a Wind Raider and told her to go away.
